thread.section_title: Hotel le Tourville - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location and Great Staf
thread.title_full: Great Location and Great Staf - Review of Hotel le Tourville, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: WNegron
title: Great Location and Great Staf
text: It's a great hotel to stay. Was amazing experience. Very close to metro station, 10 minutes walk to Eiffel Tower. My first language is Spanish and the staff help me a lot. Some of them speaks around 4 languages . They help you with everything. The breakfast was fantastic. The location of the hotel was very nice because is very close to some memorable icons of Paris and most important very close to te metro. If I come back to Paris I'm definitely come back to Hotel le Tourville.
